introduction: Series of short comedy-dramas with a Christmas theme, written by famous names recalling moments from their childhoods.3.01    Joanna Lumley's Little Cracker: Baby, Be Blonde3.02    Rebecca Front's Little Cracker: Rainy Days & Mondays3.03    Tommy Tiernan's Little Cracker: Howler3.04    Caroline Quentin's Little Cracker: Nutcracker3.05    Alison Steadman's Little Cracker: The Autograph3.06    Dylan Moran's Little Cracker: The Awkward Age3.07    Jason Manford's Little Cracker: A Tender Christmas3.08    Omid Djalili's Little Cracker: The Ten Year Plan - Fringe To Hollywood3.09    Paul O'Grady's Little Cracker: Boo! A Ghost Story3.10    Katy Brand's Little Cracker: Of All The Trees3.11    Sharon Horgan's Little Cracker: The Week Before Christmas3.12    Darren Boyd's Little Cracker: Le Concert de L'école
